rdf:Description.dc:title: Family violence in northern Alberta : addressing the issues 1988 addressing the issues /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Northern Alberta Development Council.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Review of family violence in northern Alberta to broadly examine the issues and concerns encountered by northern communities, to identify the assistance and services available & to recommend action to help alleviate the problem.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Family violence
